attributes.action: Without ANY further delay sack Ian Blair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been enough excuses and passing the buck - give him his bus fare home - he must go immediately without any payment of anykind and forfeat his pension rights. Why oh why has nobody stepped in with THE GUTS to get rid- He does not deserve the priviledge of resignation to reap money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
